Magic
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): CD List: Magic
After years of research, we have proof that only the rare types (/??? sub-breed) can be gotten off CD for any Monster Rancher 1 main breed (except Doodle) which has to be unlocked through in-game play. This means the Ape, Dragon, Ghost, Henger, Magic, and Nya types can only be found as the /??? on CD, the other forms are available through combining. This means that the following Magic types are not available on CD:

177 Eye Fan [Magic/Suezo]
178 Kaduka [Magic/Naga]
179 Kuro [Magic/Plant]
180 Magic [Magic/Magic]
181 Gangster [Magic/Henger]
  • Ardebaren (Magic/???) (182) May 12 - 11:06 am

  • Zombie (Magic/???) (183) April 29 - 07:09 am

  • Jerod (Magic/???) (184) May 24 - 04:29 am
